category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ProcessSimulate_DataPrep_DatasetsType
preference.preference_description: Defines the type of the dataset attached to product top line item revisions, to which prepared PLMXML files may be attached as named references. The PLMXML in these datasets are assumed by Process Simulate application to contain all data relevant to the configured structure. A valid value must match the setting in Process Simulate as defined in the model mapping configuration file.
